mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(id, pwd, name, nickName, sex, introduce, birth, storedFolder, storedFile, originalFileName, uploadDate, fileSize, location, concern) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{sex}, #{introduce}, #{birth}, #{storedFolder}, #{storedFile}, #{originalFileName}, now(), #{fileSize}, #{location}, #{concern});
mapper.update: update user set name=#{name}, nickName=#{nickName}, introduce=#{introduce}, birth=#{birth}, picturePath=#{picturePath}, lno=#{lno} where uno = #{uno}
update user set storedFolder = #{storedFolder}, storedFile = #{storedFile} where uno = #{uno}
mapper.select: select uno, id, pwd, name, nickName, sex, introduce, birth, picturePath, lno from user
SELECT COUNT(uno) from user where id like #{id};
